This endpoint allows you to retrieve the latest results of the Aviator game on the Estrelabet ( 
estrelabet.com )platform.  

You can access the array containing the most recent results of the Aviator game. 

Each element of the array represents the numerical value of the result obtained in the game, with the first element being the most recent and the last being the oldest.

A rich API to get EuroMillions results. With this API you can consult the last result, submit the numbers of one or more bets and check how many numbers you hit. As it has a track record since 2004, you can even get statistics on the numbers that have been drawn the most, check if your lucky numbers have ever come out in previous draws or consult the results of a specific draw. For the most recent draws, you can find out how many bets matched the numbers and how much money each one received. ...

tool_name: Real-Time PNR Status API for Indian Railways
description: It is an unofficial PNR Status API that provides real-time information on the status of Indian Railways train reservations. This API is designed for educational purposes only and is not affiliated with Indian Railways in any way.
